description: Temperatures have neared or exceeded 35°C in several parts of France, often running 10°C to 15°C above seasonal averages. On Saturday, the heat is expected to intensify, reaching up to 40°C in parts of the South and West.

headline: In India, thousands stretch to celebrate International Yoga Day
description: Thousands of people gathered in public spaces on Saturday to practice asanas and breathing exercises across the country.

headline: Ludovico Einaudi, the Italian pianist turned neoclassical star
description: The Italian musician's tranquil pieces have turned him into the genre's major star. Ahead of his upcoming Paris show on June 21, Le Monde met with him at his home in the town of Dogliani, near Turin.

headline: A captivating investigation into a compromising photo of a president
description: In his new book 'La Photo,' the journalist Patrice Duhamel revisits the long-concealed picture of a young François Mitterrand meeting with Philippe Pétain during the war.

headline: Five years later, the 'hangover' of the French citizens who took part in the Convention for the Climate
description: On June 21, 2020, 150 randomly selected citizens submitted 149 proposals to the government. Since then, some have shifted careers to work on environmental issues, while others have moved on.

headline: Guy Savoy, Michelin-starred chef: 'At 15, I spent all my summer holidays cooking at a refreshment stand'
description: 'I wouldn't be where I am today if...' In this series, Le Monde interviews a personality about a decisive moment in their life. The multi-Michelin-starred chef recalls the flavors of his childhood in the local public garden, where his parents worked.
